MOD = 8388608

def main():
  t = int(raw_input())
  for _ in xrange(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    print f_sum(n)

def f_sum(n):
  r = modpow(2, n-1)
  s = (n*n - n + 2) % MOD
  return (r*s - 1) % MOD

def modpow(b, e):
  r = 1
  while (e):
    if (e & 1): r = (r*b) % MOD
    b = (b*b) % MOD
    e //= 2
  return r

main()
